paper_abstract: Simple batch distillation has the advantages of versatility and flexibility in treating different mixtures. A mathematical model was developed for predicting distillation results for multicomponent systems based on Rayleigh equation. A Microsoft Excel Visual Basic (VB) Macro program was coded for inputting property data, carrying out calculations, and presenting outcomes in both table and graphic forms. The simulation can be conducted using the VB Macro program when users-specified inputs in mole, volume, or weight are entered. (C) 2007 Wiley Periodicals, Inc.
paper_title: The simulation of the simple batch distillation of multiple-component mixtures via Rayleigh's equation
